mapper.select: SELECT id, createdAt, updatedAt, name, path, component, icon, parentId, sort, isEnabled, deleted FROM sys_menu WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted = 0
SELECT id, createdAt, updatedAt, name, path, component, icon, parentId, sort, isEnabled, deleted FROM sys_menu WHERE deleted = 0 ORDER BY sort ASC, createdAt ASC
SELECT id, createdAt, updatedAt, name, path, component, icon, parentId, sort, isEnabled, deleted FROM sys_menu WHERE parentId = #{parentId} AND deleted = 0 ORDER BY sort ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_menu (createdAt, updatedAt, name, path, component, icon, parentId, sort, isEnabled, deleted) VALUES (NOW(), NOW(), #{name}, #{path}, #{component}, #{icon}, #{parentId}, #{sort}, #{isEnabled}, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_menu SET updatedAt = NOW(), name = #{name}, path = #{path}, component = #{component}, icon = #{icon}, parentId = #{parentId}, sort = #{sort}, isEnabled = #{isEnabled} WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted = 0
UPDATE sys_menu SET deleted = 1, updatedAt = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
